article_title: Much More Is Needed to Stop Iran From Getting the Bomb
article_text:
The Iran Nuclear Agreement Review Act is now on its way to the White House for a reluctant signature by President Obama. He was forced to accept, by overwhelming votes in both chambers, Congress’s constitutional role in reviewing any nuclear deal with Iran and the lifting of any congressionally imposed sanctions. Now the hardest work begins.

The president must either negotiate an agreement that will permanently prevent an...

twitter.description: Sen. Lindsey Graham says much more is needed to stop Iran from getting nuclear weapons. Here’s what we should be looking for in a final deal.
twitter.title: Much More Is Needed to Stop Iran From Getting the Bomb
